text: It's no destination restaurant like Pho Tay Ho on Beaubien/St-Denis. This is the place we first tried because 1) I felt like Vietnamese and 2) I wanted it now. I don't know many places that could mess up the beef/rice combo. The Pho is another story. Luckily, this place that opened just a few blocks from my place does both good enough. Fleury has too many Vietnamese restaurants (La Citronelle, Les Petites Baguettes, Sushi Sama) within a few blocks. Having tried all, I could safely say that this is your safest bet.  4* for proximity and taste. If you don't live in Ahuntsic, I wouldn't bother going as I'm sure your neighborhood has a legit Vietnamese joint.

Physiquement, je ne suis jamais aller, par contre j'ai commander quelques fois. La nourriture y est bien et c'est parfait quand on a besoin d'une soupe tonkinoise. Le nid  d'oiseau est bien et les sushis que j'ai pu goûté sont extrêmement savoureux.   La soupe est bonne..mais il y en a des meilleurs. La livraison est hyper rapide et le tout est bien emballé et les éléments sont séparés donc parfait pour servir frais. Par contre, je ne sais pas pourquoi quand je ne mange pas tout et je réchauffe la nourriture..le jour après...ce n'est vraiment pas mangeable. Bref, je vais sûrement aller faire un tour puisque c'est proche de chez moi et c'est un resto AVV.

I ordered sushi sama through the just eat app and I did not regret it! The sushi was fresh and delicious. The prices are decent and they had good promotions through the just eat application. When I went to pick it up, they seemed busy and business seems to be doing well! Overall, very yummy and I would recommend! I would definitely order again from them.
